title: Impossible Lag
body: Is there something wrong wtih ISP providers like was being disccussed last night? Or is it to do with your servers, one second 37ms then 7000, bit of a difference. Like can we get news on this. There were red posts last night saying u were aware and now we know nothing,

replies.body:
It might not be related to the ISP, and possibly just something on your end. Or even better, it's the servers' fault!

Could you [perform a network diagnostic](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and note anything here that appears in red? You'll need Java enabled to do the test. Do not post the entire log.
